parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Specifies the operation to perform. Currently only supports generating a secret.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for generating the time-based one-time password.

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: HMAC hashing algorithm for generating the TOTP code. Defaults to SHA1.

parameters.name: digits
parameters.description: Number of digits in the generated TOTP code. Defaults to 6 digits.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: How many seconds the generated TOTP code is valid for. Defaults to 30 seconds.
